name: Baby Puzzles. Farm Animals
description:
Hey, little explorer! Welcome to the puzzle game full of various animals! Let’s study the fascinating wildlife in a fun and educational way! Wow! So many animals!

Does your toddler likes visiting the Zoo, games about animals and enjoy playing with pets? Then you found the very right puzzle game for your little one! Here you’ll find lots of animals of all kinds and sizes! Full version of the game includes 5 fun-filled themes with 60 animals for toddlers and kids:

Farm kids learning puzzles. Let’s go to a farm where a piggy, a cow, horses puzzles, a lamb, ducks live!

Africa. Take an imaginary safari journey to Africa and meet its inhabitants: an elephant, a lion, a giraffe, a flamingo and more.

Forest. Discover various animals living in a forest: a fox, birds, owl, bunny, a bear, a dear and lots of others.

Pets. How many pets do you know? Find kittens, puppies, fish, hamster, parrots and turtles.

Sea. This theme will appreciate little ones who are crazy about the sea. Explore the mysterious underwater world! You’ll learn various fish, a shark, an octopus, a sea horse, and a whale.

How to play these puzzle games for kids kindergarten free: touch the screen and drag the animal pic to the correct place matching the image and its shape. When a puzzle is completed enjoy the happy cheering and then tap the arrow to assemble the next one.

Features of the animal puzzles for kids free:
- Five colorful themes with 60 silly animals;
- When a puzzle is completed children are rewarded with colorful balloon popping;
- The game is highly interactive. All puzzles 4 kids animals are filled with sweet animations and sounds;
- Pleasant background music and sound effects;
- Puzzles are randomly generated so every time your little one will play different shape puzzle games;
- Easy navigation between puzzles specially designed for toddlers and preschool children;
- Interactive app encourages child’s development of attention, logic thinking, memory, cognitive skills, fine motor skills, etc.;
- And a pleasant bonus for parents – you don’t have to worry about losing any of the puzzle pieces!

Download the educational puzzle games for kids and forget about boredom!
